title: Meditation - Breath by Breath: Relaxing with Our Life (2019-06-05)
itunes:title: Meditation - Breath by Breath: Relaxing with Our Life
description:
Meditation - Breath by Breath: Relaxing with Our Life (2019-06-05) - The breath can be a powerful portal to presence. This meditation guides us in relaxing with the breath, including the breath in a body scan, and then allowing the breath to serve as an anchor when the mind gets lost in thoughts. As we settle with the breath as a home base, we find we can then open to the changing waves of experience with increasing balance, clarity and ease.

Join Tara's email community at http://eepurl.com/6YfI, to receive exclusive updates, events, and meditations.
- Get a free download of Tara’s new 10 min meditation: “Mindful Breathing: Finding Calm and Ease,"
- Plus a bonus gift: "8 Essential Tips to Nourish Your Meditation Practice."
